set.name: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: White Command Dragon/Alien

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Super Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: King Command Dragon/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may return up to 3 spells from your graveyard to your hand. Then all other creatures in the battle zone get -9000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {WORLD BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Victory Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Black Command Dragon/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have Red ABYTHEN Kaiser and White TENMTH Kaiser in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 9000 or less and destroy them. Then choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Loop Awaken—At the start of your turn, you may flip this creature to the Cebu Lancer, the Temporal side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

(At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

(It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your Aliens. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Hedrian/Grand Devil/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your other Aliens are destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Beast Folk/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a non-nature card from your deck and put it into your mana zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other Aliens in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Death Puppet/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Horned Beast/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Alien from your deck, show that Alien to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Dragons may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ During your opponent's next turn, your Aliens can't be attacked. ■ Put an Alien psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-05 Full Foil Pack: Revival Hero - The Alien
